Package datastructure

Class VariantsDictionary

java.lang.Object
datastructure.MusialStorage
public class VariantsDictionary
extends java.lang.Object
Main data structure to store information about variants.
Since:
2.1
Version:
2.1
Author:
Simon Hackl

  • Field Summary

    Modifier and Type Field Description
    static java.lang.String ATTRIBUTE_VARIANT_SWAB_NAME
    Static property to use as suffix for the 'VSWAB' annotation key in FeatureEntrys and SampleEntrys.

    The chromosome name on which all maintained features are located.

    Date tag for time stamp generation.

    Map of String (key) / FeatureEntry (value) pairs; All (gene) features that are maintained.

    Transient property to store novel variants during the execution of the updateVDict module/task.

    Set of parameters, a VariantsDictionaryParameters instance, used for variantInformation filtering.

    Software name for software version meta-information generation.

    Hierarchical map structure to store variants wrt. maintained features and samples.
    static java.lang.String WILD_TYPE_SAMPLE_ID
    Static property to use as the sample name/id for the wild type.

  • Field Details

    • parameters

      public final VariantsDictionaryParameters parameters
      Set of parameters, a VariantsDictionaryParameters instance, used for variantInformation filtering.

    • features

      public final java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​FeatureEntry> features
      Map of String (key) / FeatureEntry (value) pairs; All (gene) features that are maintained.

    • samples

      public final java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​SampleEntry> samples
      Map of String (key) / SampleEntry (value) pairs; All samples that are maintained.

    • software

      public final java.lang.String software
      Software name for software version meta-information generation.

    • date

      public final java.lang.String date
      Date tag for time stamp generation.

    • chromosome

      public final java.lang.String chromosome
      The chromosome name on which all maintained features are located.

    • variants

      public final java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentSkipListMap<java.lang.Integer,​java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentSkipListMap<java.lang.String,​NucleotideVariantAnnotationEntry>> variants
      Hierarchical map structure to store variants wrt. maintained features and samples. The first layer represents the position on the chromosome. The second layer represents the variantInformation content.

    • WILD_TYPE_SAMPLE_ID

      public static final java.lang.String WILD_TYPE_SAMPLE_ID
      Static property to use as the sample name/id for the wild type. TODO: Move to separate class with other attribute names.

    • novelVariants

      public transient java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentSkipListSet<java.lang.String> novelVariants
      Transient property to store novel variants during the execution of the updateVDict module/task.

  • Constructor Details

    • VariantsDictionary

      public VariantsDictionary​(java.lang.Double minCoverage, java.lang.Double minFrequency, java.lang.Double minHet, java.lang.Double maxHet, java.lang.Double minQuality, java.lang.String chromosome)
      Constructor of VariantsDictionary.
      Parameters:
      minCoverage - Double; Minimal read coverage to use for variantInformation filtering.
      minFrequency - Double; Minimal form frequency to use for hom. variantInformation filtering.
      minHet - Double; Minimal form frequency to use for het. variantInformation filtering.
      maxHet - Double; Maximal form frequency to use for het. variantInformation filtering.
      minQuality - Double; Minimal Phred scaled genotyping call quality to use for variantInformation filtering.
      chromosome - String; Name of the chromosome on which maintained FeatureEntrys are located; Has to reflect the value in the used input .vcf, .fasta and .gff files.

  • Method Details

    • addVariant

      public void addVariant​(java.lang.String featureId, int referencePosition, java.lang.String variantContent, java.lang.String referenceContent, java.lang.String sampleId, boolean isPrimary, boolean isRejected, double quality, double coverage, double frequency)
      Adds information about a variantInformation to variants.
      Parameters:
      featureId - String; The internal name of the feature for which this variantInformation was detected.
      referencePosition - Integer; The position on the reference chromosome (1-based indexing).
      variantContent - String; The alternate content of the variantInformation; Single letter contents reflect SNVs, multi letter contents reflect SVs.
      referenceContent - String; The reference content of the variantInformation; The length in relation to the variantContent parameter indicates whether a SV is a insertion or deletion.
      sampleId - String; The internal name of the sample of which the variantInformation was called.
      isPrimary - Boolean; Whether the variantInformation call is a primary call, i.e. if it is the variantInformation with the highest frequency.
      isRejected - Boolean; Whether the variantInformation was rejected, i.e. if it failed any filtering criteria.
      quality - Double; The Phred scaled GT quality of the call.
      coverage - Double; The depth of coverage of the call.
      frequency - Double; The allelic frequency of the call.

    • addVariantAnnotation

      public void addVariantAnnotation​(int position, java.lang.String content, java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String> annotations)
      Adds annotations to an existing variantInformation.
      Parameters:
      position - Integer; The position at which the variantInformation is stored.
      content - String; The content of the variantInformation.
      annotations - HashMap of String key/value pairs which reflect the annotations that shall be added.

    • dump

      public void dump​(java.io.File outfile) throws MusialIOException
      Dumps this VariantsDictionary instance into a JSON format file. The output is compressed with gzip dependent on the value of Musial.COMPRESS.
      Parameters:
      outfile - File object pointing to the file the VDict should be written to.
      Throws:
      MusialIOException - If the output generation fails.

    • getSampleVariants

      public java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,​java.lang.String> getSampleVariants​(java.lang.String fId, java.lang.String sId)
      Extracts a HashMap of Integer/String key/value pairs reflecting all (filtered) variants for one sample and feature.
      Parameters:
      fId - String; The name/id of the feature for which variants shall be extracted.
      sId - String; The name/id of the sample for which variants shall be extracted.
      Returns:
      HashMap of variants extracted for the specified feature and sample.

    • getNucleotideSequence

      public java.lang.String getNucleotideSequence​(java.lang.String fId, java.lang.String sId)
      Extracts a String yielding the nucleotide sequence with all variants of one sample being incorporated for one feature.
      Parameters:
      fId - String; The name/id of the feature for which the sequence shall be extracted.
      sId - String; The name/id of the sample for which the sequence shall be extracted.
      Returns:
      String; Nucleotide sequence of one sample wrt. one feature.

    • getProteoformVariants

      public java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String> getProteoformVariants​(java.lang.String fId, java.lang.String pfId, boolean includeDeletions)
      Extracts a HashMap of String/String key/value pairs reflecting all (filtered) variants for one proteoform and feature.

      - Returns null if no protein is allocated to the feature. - Keys of the returned map are formatted as X+Y; X is the position wrt. the reference protein and Y the number of inserted positions.

      Parameters:
      fId - String; The name/id of the feature for which variants shall be extracted.
      pfId - String; The name/id of the proteoform for which variants shall be extracted.
      includeDeletions - Boolean whether deletions shall be included as variants.
      Returns:
      HashMap of variants extracted for the specified feature and proteoform.

    • getProteoformSequence

      public java.lang.String getProteoformSequence​(java.lang.String fId, java.lang.String pfId) throws MusialBioException
      Extracts a String yielding the amino-acid sequence with all variants of one proteoform being incorporated for one feature.

      The translated reference feature sequence will be used as the reference amino-acid sequence.

      Parameters:
      fId - String; The name/id of the feature for which the sequence shall be extracted.
      pfId - String; The name/id of the proteoform for which the sequence shall be extracted.
      Returns:
      String; Amino-acid sequence of one proteoform wrt. one feature.
      Throws:
      MusialBioException - If the translation of the reference sequence fails.
